QuestData.Title: The Eternal Nemesis
QuestData.Description:
<Helya's voice echoes in the sky above the altar>
You say that you do not belong here among the unworthy, outsider, but your spirit fragments so easily. How am I to know you speak the truth?
I cannot, so you must show me.
Bring yourself to the eternal battlefield and face my champion. If you manage to defeat him, then I may grant you a pardon.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Ashildir and inform her of Helya's challenge.
QuestData.RewardText: You do not look good. $B$BI take it Helya did not prove lenient?
